title: Translate Into System
text: Let's set $$x$$ to the number of adult tickets sold and $$y$$ to the number of child tickets sold. Then, we have: $$x+y=147$$, $$11x+8y=1302$$
speech: Let's set  x  to the number of adult tickets sold and  y  to the number of child tickets sold. Then, we have:  x, plus y is equal to 147 ,  11 x, plus 8 y is equal to 1302

title: Eliminating One Variable
text: Let's eliminate $$y$$ so that we can solve for $$x$$. Multiply the first equation by $$-8$$ and then add. $$3x=126$$
speech: Let's eliminate  y  so that we can solve for  x . Multiply the first equation by  negative 8  and then add.  3 x is equal to 126

. Multiply the first equation by   negative 8
and then add.   3 x is equal to 126

title: Solving the Equation
speech: x is equal to 126 over 3, is equal to 42 .  42  adult tickets were sold.
pacedSpeech: x is equal to 126 over 3, is equal to 42
